BackgroundFetch.EventDispatchFailure.StartWorker{BackgroundFetchEvents}
BackgroundMode.OnStartup.IsBackgroundModePrefEnabled
histogram.summary: Logged during BackgroundModeManager's initialization. Indicates the state of the kBackgroundModeEnabled pref on startup.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Event.BatchSize
histogram.summary: Records the number of `sync` events which were fired in a batch. A batch is defined as the set of `sync` events dispatched at the same time by the BackgroundSyncManager. One-shots usually run individually (a batch of one), unless the device was offline and multiple are waiting for the device to go back online.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Event.FromWakeupTask
histogram.summary: Records whether the fired `sync` events upon completion orginated from a background wakeup task or the foreground.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Event.OneShotResultPattern
histogram.summary:
Records whether a `sync` event succeeded or failed and whether the sync event finished in the foreground or background.
A `sync` event finished in the foreground if the associated Service Worker Registration has a client at the time that the event finished.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Event.OneShotStartedInForeground
histogram.summary: Records whether a one-shot sync started firing in the foreground or background. Called shortly before the event is fired.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Event.PeriodicResultPattern
histogram.summary:
Records whether a periodic sync event succeeded or failed and whether the sync event finished in the foreground or background.
A sync event finished in the foreground if the associated Service Worker Registration has a client at the time that the event finished.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Event.PeriodicStartedInForeground
histogram.summary: Records whether a periodic sync event started firing in the foreground or background. Called shortly before the event is fired.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Event.Time
histogram.summary: Time taken to execute a batch of one-shot sync events. A batch is defined as the set of sync events dispatched at the same time by the BackgroundSyncManager. One-shots usually run individually (a batch of one), unless the device was offline and multiple are waiting for the device to go back online.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.LaunchTask.PlayServicesAvailable
histogram.summary: Records whether Google Play Services is available to the Background Sync system on Android, for scheduling future sync events when the browser is not running. This will be logged at most once per run.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.NetworkObserver.HasPermission
histogram.summary: Records whether the browser has sufficient permissions to create a BackgroundSyncNetworkObserver object on Android, at the point when it tries to create it. This should never be false, but is being tracked in order to help resolve crbug.com/545473.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Periodic.Wakeup.DelayTime
histogram.summary: Records time elapsed since the soonest expected wake-up time. Recorded whenever a periodic Background Sync Chrome wake-up task is called after loading the native parts of the browser.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Registration.OneShot
histogram.summary: Records the result of attempting to register a one-shot sync.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Registration.OneShot.CouldFire
histogram.summary: Records the result of attempting to register a one-shot sync in a situation where the sync could fire immediately.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Registration.OneShot.EventSucceededAtCompletion
histogram.summary: Records whether the dispatched sync event succeeded at the completion of the one-shot Background Sync registration.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Registration.OneShot.IsDuplicate
histogram.summary: Records whether a one-shot sync registration exactly duplicates an existing registered sync.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Registration.OneShot.NumAttemptsForSuccessfulEvent
histogram.summary: Records the number of times a sync event was dispatched for a one-shot Background Sync registration before it succeeded.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Registration.Periodic
histogram.summary: Records the result of attempting to register a periodic sync. This is called at each successful registration.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Registration.Periodic.IsDuplicate
histogram.summary: Records whether a periodic sync registration duplicates the tag of an existing registered sync. Recorded upon each successful periodic Background Sync registration.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Registration.Periodic.MinInterval
histogram.summary: Records the minInterval requested, in seconds, when a periodic sync is successfully registered.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Unregistration.Periodic
histogram.summary: Records the result of attempting to unregister a periodic sync.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.Wakeup.DelayTime
histogram.summary: If BackgroundSync uses BackgroundTaskScheduler to wake up Chrome, this records the time elapsed since the soonest expected wake-up time. Recorded whenever a BackgroundSync background task is called after loading the native parts of the browser.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.WakeupTaskFiredEvents.OneShot
histogram.summary: If Chrome is woken up by the one shot Background Sync Background task, this records whether any sync events were fired as a result. Recorded whenever Chrome is woken up to process one-shot Background Sync registrations on Android.

histogram.name: BackgroundSync.WakeupTaskFiredEvents.Periodic
histogram.summary: If Chrome is woken up by the periodic Background Sync Background task,this records whether any periodicsync events were fired as a result. Recorded whenever Chrome is woken up to process periodic Background Sync registrations on Android.

histogram.name: BackgroundTracing.SamplingProfilerUnwindResult
histogram.summary: Records the reason for unwind failues in sampling profiler.
